tensorlayer.init¶

xavier_init(shape[, uniform]) Set the parameter initialization using the method described.
Initializers
tensorlayer.init.xavier_init(shape, uniform=True)[source]¶

Set the parameter initialization using the method described. This method is designed to keep the scale of the gradients roughly the same in all layers.

n_inputs
: int
The number of units of the previous layer
n_units
: int
The number of units of the current layer
uniform
: True, False
If true use a uniform distribution, otherwise use a normal.

An initializer for 2D matrix.

Glorot, X., & Bengio, Y. (2010). Understanding the difficulty of training deep feedforward neural networks. Proceedings of the 13th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics (AISTATS), 9, 249–256. http://doi.org/10.1.1.207.2059
